Newark Forensic Economist

Expert economic damage analysis and litigation support for Newark's comprehensive law firms. Delivering comprehensive forensic economics services with precision and authority in the heart of the New York metropolitan area.

Court-Qualified Expert Northern New Jersey Fast Turnaround Detailed Reports

Newark's legal professionals require forensic economic analysis that meets the highest standards of the tri-state area's most sophisticated litigation. At Skerritt Economics, we provide comprehensive economic damage calculations, business valuations, and expert testimony services tailored for the complex, high-stakes environment of New Jersey's largest city.

Our practice serves the Newark legal community with understanding of the region's unique economic landscape, from transportation and finance to manufacturing and healthcare, delivering precise analysis that strengthens your cases and supports successful outcomes.

Metropolitan Market Expertise

Comprehensive understanding of Newark's position in the New York metropolitan economy, including transportation hubs, financial services, and global commerce. Our analysis reflects the unique wage patterns and career opportunities of this major urban center.

High-Stakes Litigation Experience

Extensive experience in complex, high-value cases throughout New Jersey federal and state courts. Our methodologies are proven in the most demanding litigation environments with rigorous peer review and rigorous scrutiny.

timely response for Urgent Matters

Understanding the fast-paced nature of Newark litigation, we provide expedited analysis without compromising quality. Emergency consultations and accelerated reporting available for time-sensitive matters.

Institutional-Quality Analysis

Professional-grade economic analysis with detailed methodology documentation, supporting data, and clear presentation materials. All work product designed to meet the scrutiny of sophisticated opposing counsel and expert witnesses.

Specialized Economic Analysis for Newark Cases

Comprehensive forensic economics services designed for the sophisticated litigation environment of Newark and the greater New York metropolitan area.

Personal Injury & Wrongful Death

  • Metropolitan wage and benefits analysis
  • Life care planning for catastrophic injuries
  • Household services valuations
  • Present value calculations with inflation adjustments
  • Vocational rehabilitation assessments
  • Quality of life economic impact analysis

Employment Litigation

  • Executive compensation analysis
  • Discrimination and harassment damages
  • Wrongful termination economic impact
  • Career trajectory modeling
  • Stock option and equity compensation losses
  • Non-compete agreement economic analysis

Commercial Disputes

  • Business interruption and lost profits
  • Contract breach economic damages
  • Partnership and shareholder disputes
  • Intellectual property valuation
  • Market manipulation analysis
  • Antitrust and competition damages

Complex Financial Litigation

  • Securities fraud damage analysis
  • Financial institution disputes
  • Investment loss calculations
  • Derivative and structured product analysis
  • Market efficiency testing
  • Regulatory compliance cost analysis

Comprehensive Economic Services

Full-spectrum forensic economics and business valuation services designed to meet the sophisticated needs of Newark's legal community.

Economic Damage Analysis

Comprehensive calculation of economic losses including lost earnings, benefits, and future economic capacity with detailed supporting documentation and peer-reviewed methodologies.

Business Valuation

Professional business appraisals for litigation, divorce, partnership disputes, and commercial transactions using recognized valuation standards and market-based approaches.

Financial Analysis

Complex financial modeling and analysis for securities litigation, fraud cases, and investment disputes with sophisticated econometric and statistical techniques.

Expert Witness Testimony

Clear, courtroom testimony with comprehensive preparation and professional exhibits designed to effectively communicate complex economic concepts to judges and juries.

Settlement Support

Economic analysis and documentation to support settlement negotiations with detailed present value calculations, risk assessments, and alternative scenario modeling.

Litigation Consulting

Strategic consulting on economic issues throughout the litigation process, from case evaluation and discovery through trial preparation and post-judgment enforcement.
